page.title: 07Churchgate St Church Hall
page.content:
The{Church Hall}was built in 1867. During the Second World War it was used as a {mortuary.}It is used as a{ {polling station}during elections. The{rent}for hire of the hall is Â£3 per hour.
Regular activities in the hall are:- {Sunday} Sunday School. {Monday} Mothers' Union. {Tuesday} Coffee morning. Playgroup in the afternoon. {Wednesday}Mothers' meeting. {Thursday} Babies' creche. Band practise one night a week.
The{Young Farmers' Club}uses the hall occasionally.
If the hall is too small{Churchgate {School}hall may be used.
